attributes.action: as for the resignation of all mps found to have morally abused the expenses systyem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we believe that it is unjust that members of parliament who have morally abused the expenses systytem should remain an mp. 
at the very least those mps should resign their seat and face the electorate in a by-election.
if they believe they have done nothing immoral, they should not be scared of going to the polls to see what the pubic think.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
